# SnapStream

> Instant Website Screenshot Generator & API

SnapStream is a free, client-side web application that allows users to capture high-resolution screenshots of any website. 

## Features
- **URL**: https://snapstream.dippanbhusal.tech/
- **Input**: User provides a URL.
- **Output**: Generates a high-quality PNG image.
- **Tech Stack**: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JS, Microlink API.
- **Privacy**: No server-side storage; all processing is client-side.

## Usage
To use the tool, visit the URL, enter a target website, select a viewport (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile), and click "Capture".
